description: The tentacles of the law are many and they reach into the lives of ordinary people, sometimes when least expected.  When that happens, it can cause alarm and anxiety.  So much is at stake when you are involved in a legal proceeding and the costs of an error can be serious.  So the aim of this podcast is to take the mystery out of the law for the ordinary person.  We aim to give it context and to make it comprehensible.
title: Everyday Law

episodes.title: On Probate
episodes.description: In this episode, we tackle probate in all its mystery.

episodes.title: Episode 23: Anatomy of a Trial

episodes.title: Wills and Trusts

Our lively conversation ranged from the dangers of dying without a will and the estate plan that Illinois may have in store for you to the basics of trusts.
